document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f0ac5c">vastest </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f0ac5c">earthly </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">Day </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">shrunken </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f0ac5c">small </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">By </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">one </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">Defaulting </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">Face </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Behind </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9870ff">Pall </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: The vastest earthly day
